test.name: Automatisation du site conserto

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Execute Javascript
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: return document.readyState == "complete" Without any arguments.
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Page Accueil - vérif titre et éléments du menu nav :
kw.arg: Page Accueil - vérif titre et éléments du menu nav :
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Get Source
kw.msg: ${html} = <html><head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="description" content="Positive Technologie"> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8"> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-...
kw.doc: Returns the entire HTML source of the current page or frame.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${log} = Conserto - La Transformation Numérique Agile et Harmonieuse
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Conserto - La Transformation Numérique Agile et Harmonieuse
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.msg: Page title is 'Conserto - La Transformation Numérique Agile et Harmonieuse'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

iter.var: Conserto - La Transformation Numérique Agile et Harmonieuse

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: 1ère méthode de vérif élements du bloc nav :
kw.arg: 1ère méthode de vérif élements du bloc nav :
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: ${nav_value} = POSITIVE TECHNOLOGIE NOS CLIENTS ACADEMY BLOG CONTACT
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element '//nav[@id="nav-main" and @class="nav-main"]' contains text 'POSITIVE TECHNOLOGIE NOS CLIENTS ACADEMY BLOG CONTACT'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: 2ème méthode de vérif élements du bloc nav :

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Element Screenshot
kw.doc: Captures a screenshot from the element identified by ``locator`` and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: méthode réutilisable pour vérifier un texte :

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element '//div[@class='words-container']' contains exact text 'Positive Technologie'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

test.doc: Scénario CONSERTO-CON0001 : Vérifier quelques éléments du site conserto. JDD : Salarié chez conserto, ayant une adresse mail et un mot de passe actifs.
